mapper.select: SELECT dob_code FROM tbl_dobby WHERE user_code = #{ userCode }

SELECT count(CASE WHEN order_status = 'O' THEN 1 END) as order_count, count(CASE WHEN order_status = 'A' THEN 1 END) as accept_count, count(CASE WHEN order_status = 'F' THEN 1 END) as finish_count FROM tbl_order a JOIN tbl_service b on (a.service_code = b.service_code) WHERE dob_code = #{ dobCode }

SELECT a.order_code, a.order_datetime, a.reserve_datetime, a.cancel_datetime, a.reject_datetime, a.cancel_reason, a.reject_reason, a.order_status, a.total_price, b.service_title, b.service_price, b.thumbnail_url, c.user_name, d.pay_status, d.pay_type, e.option_name, e.option_price FROM tbl_order a JOIN tbl_service b on a.service_code = b.service_code JOIN tbl_user c on a.user_code = c.user_code JOIN tbl_payment d on a.order_code = d.order_code LEFT JOIN tbl_option e on a.option_code = e.option_code WHERE a.order_code = #{ orderCode };
